favourite.article: More complete name of the author of this hymn is Arthur Cleveland Downer. He wrote "THE PRINCIPLE OF INTERPRETATION OF THE EPISTLE TO THE HEBREWS", "The Mission and Ministration of the Holy Spirit", "A century of evangelical religion in Oxford" and "Thomas Scott the commentator: A memoir of his life" from around 1901-1910. He was Reverend of Christ Church, Harrow Road in the Diocese of London of the Church of England, and was active in missionary work for Africa and the East. - hymnary.org, Proceedings of the Church Missionary Society for Africa and the East, Amazon
